text: News Time also known as News Time Bangla is a 24-hour Bengali news channel launched in 2010. In 2011 they broadcast the 33rd Federation cup held in Kolkata. ==See also== * International broadcasting * List of Indian television stations * 24-hour television news channels Category:24-hour television news channels in India Category:Television channels and stations established in 2010 Category:Bengali-language television channels in India Category:Television stations in Kolkata
title: News Time
